typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		METRIC1 as string,
		COL1 as string,
		COL2 as string,
		COL3 as string,
		COL4 as string,
		COL5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> stagetbl1
sorterstagetbl1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	 
	validateSchema: false,
	insertable:true,mapColumn(
		COL1,
		COL2,
		COL3,
		COL4,
		COL5,
		max_metric,
		min_metric,
		avg_metric,
		total_metric = METRIC1,
		entry_cnt
	)) ~> stagetbl
stagetbl1 derive(METRIC1 = METRIC1,
		COL1 = COL1,
		COL2 = COL2,
		COL3 = COL3,
		COL4 = COL4,
		COL5 = COL5) ~> exprstagetbl1
exprstagetbl1 aggregate(groupBy(COL1,
		COL2,
		COL3,
		COL4,
		COL5),
	METRIC1 = sum(METRIC1)) ~> aggrstagetbl1
aggrstagetbl1 derive(COL1 = COL1,
		COL2 = COL2,
		COL3 = COL3,
		COL4 = COL4,
		COL5 = COL5,
		METRIC1 = METRIC1) ~> exprstagetbl11
exprstagetbl11 aggregate(groupBy(COL1,
		COL2,
		COL3,
		COL4,
		COL5),
	max_metric = max(METRIC1),
	min_metric = max(METRIC1),
	METRIC1 = sum(METRIC1)) ~> aggrstagetbl11
aggrstagetbl11 sort(asc(COL1,true),
	asc(COL2,true),
	asc(COL3,true),
	asc(COL4,true),
	asc(COL5,true)) ~> sorterstagetbl1
